title: Padre Island National Seashore: Webcams
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Weather     Webcams                Webcams                       Padre Island National Seashore- Malaquite Beach  Welcome to the Malaquite Beach webcam page. The refresh rate of the webcam is every 30 seconds. For updates on weather and beach conditions at Padre Island National Seashore, please call our Weather Forecast and Beach Conditions Hotline at (361) 949-8175.   View webcam
